item.title: How i make this command donator+
item.dc:creator: @kenvanbael kenvanbael
item.description:
@kenvanbael wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals(“yell”) && p.Donator == 1){
for (Player player : Server.engine.players) {
if (player != null) {
if (p.muteType == 1) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You are muted and cannot yell until an member of staff unmutes you.”);
return;
}
if (p.rights == 0 )
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, “<img=3><shad=ff0000>[”+p.username+"]: “+playerCommand.substring(5));
else if (p.rights == 1)
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, “<img=0><shad=3300ff>[”+p.username+”]: “+playerCommand.substring(5));
else if (p.rights >= 2)
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, “<img=1><shad=33ff00>[”+p.username+”]: "+playerCommand.substring(5));
}
}

  • how can i add things like [don] [mod] [admin] [server-owner] to it?

Read full topic
